autocomplete.no_repeat_new: New no-repeat window in this flow
autocomplete.set_state_new: New set state in this flow, will be known after saving the flow

notification.welcome: Welcome to **FlowBits**! Go to flowbits.nl to learn more about what you can do with FlowBits.

events.title: Events
events.description: Events track when something happens and keep a history of timestamps. Use event actions, conditions, and triggers in your flows to track occurrences and check how often or when events happened.
events.empty: No events have been created yet.

flags.title: Flags
flags.description: Multiple flags can be active simultaneously. Create and manage flags using flag actions, conditions, and triggers in your flows.
flags.empty: No flags have been created yet.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Labels store key-value pairs for use in your flows. Use label actions, conditions, and triggers to set, get, and check values dynamically.
labels.empty: No labels have been created yet.

modes.title: Modes
modes.description: Only one mode can be active at a time. Create and manage modes using mode actions, conditions, and triggers in your flows.
modes.empty: No modes have been created yet.

sets.title: Sets
sets.description: Sets are collections of boolean states that can be evaluated as a group. A set is active when any of its states is active. Use set actions, conditions, and triggers in your flows to manage grouped states.
sets.empty: No sets have been created yet.

timers.title: Timers
timers.description: Timers count down from a specified duration and can be started, paused, stopped, and reset. Use timer actions, conditions, and triggers in your flows to manage countdowns and respond when timers finish.
timers.empty: No timers have been created yet.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: These are feature statistics for FlowBits. They are based on your flows.

card_statistics.title: Flow card statistics
card_statistics.description: These are usage statistics for individual flow cards.
